hero.title: Este Nómada
hero.subtitle: Eastern cuisine, born on the road
hero.description: Authentic flavors from Central Asia, prepared with love and tradition

about.title: About Este Nómada
about.description: We are travelers who carry the warmth of home in every dish. Our recipes have been passed down through generations, and each meal tells a story of journeys, encounters, and traditions.
about.missionText: To share authentic Eastern cuisine with everyone we meet on our journey, preserving traditions and creating new memories.

menu.title: Menu
menu.subtitle: Each dish is prepared with love and according to traditional recipes

stories.title: Stories on the Road
stories.subtitle: Stories about our journey, dishes, and people we meet along the way

pathMap.title: Route Map
pathMap.quote: Every dish is a point on our journey

order.postalCodeRequired: Postal code is required for delivery
